lines.text: By golly, I'm the richest man in six counties.
Who expects a psychologist to think? Especially when you are so busy thinking what you think other people are thinking.
Well, certainly. How else can we create the proper atmosphere for him?... Harmony in the home.
Ja, these are the sacrifices we have to make for science.
Look, I might as well tell you now. He's a monkey.
You should have seen my brother Gus.
You're no dope, Jane. You couldn't be. You haven't a university degree and you don't teach logic.

[to Bonzo]
What am I going to do with you? Papa is in jail, and by now they're giving him the 13th degree.

[referring to Boyd's father]
When he was buried, there wasn't a dry eye in the cellblock.
I'm going to make that old man change his attitude if it takes till I'm 90.
Of course, Valerie probably won't be interested in me when I'm 90.
The dean has asked me to quietly resign at the end of the term.
